Trinity/Nighlight::

Nighlight took Trinity in arms and calmed her, took a while that 
Trinity fell sleep, but it's seems that she was uneasy. Nightlight 
left her in the bed, wraped her and caressed her cheek; after that 
she stood  up and walked towards Aerotaur, she looked to him and 
after that a Trinity she said sadly "Perhaps, we should move... this 
base is unsafely... we lost alot friends here..."


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>        He rushes in after Nightlight.  "Of course not.  We'll never 
leave 
> you."  He looks at Nightlight, his eyes questioning her about what 
to do 
> next."
